expression: You are just the spark my battery needs!
Your enthusiasm for artistic expression motivates those around you to express themselves.
You are looking fantastic today, get out there and kill it.
Your energy and spirit draw people to you.
You really know how to dress and those around you are green with envy.
Talent does not come in a more beautiful package than you.
Your childlike wonder of the world swells the hearts of others with joy.
You are a cornerstone example to your coworkers of how to get the job done right.
When people need answers, they come to you.
You don't need to say a word to fill the room with your cheer.
Your vibe is refreshing like the freshly sprouted flowers in spring.
Your voice is as sweet as the springtime rain.
Your spirit brightens the soul and your voice freshens the air.
You irradiate a comfort and warmth like that of a lazy nap on the beach.
Your embrace brings the quiet joy of late-night stargazing.
The only thing better than a cold drink on a hot day is spending it with you.
When the chill sets in you are the warm chicken soup for the souls of others.
You look straight off the cover of an autumn edition, fashion magazine.
A warm coffee can only be properly enjoyed in your company.
When the cold and dark winter sets in, your friends seek you out for your bright attitude and warmth.
Your warmth and passion keep the chill at bay.
You are as gentle and beautiful as the falling snow.
